lu_part_lantern_upgrade:
Adds a lantern providing light at deck
Lantern and tent provides a warm place to rest
lu_part_tent_upgrade:
Adds an awning to protect from the elements
Allows you to change its style
lu_part_mast_upgrade:
Adds a beam for a lantern and a tent placing
Makes the mast removable
Allows you to change sails style
lu_part_hull_upgrade1:
Increases health
Adds shields for extra protection
Allows you to change shields style
lu_part_turrets_upgrade: Adds a pair of mini-turrets that shoot bolts at enemies
lu_part_wisp_upgrade: Mount the wisp torch to the top of the mast
lu_part_maptable_upgrade: With this table you can record and share your explorations of the tenth world.
